resources:
0 500
"AllTrans" "Loading List of Applications - Please Wait" "Some Error. Could not clear translation cache!" "Translate Cache for this app has been erased!" "Could not load the Per-app preference page. Close and re-open application again."
"App Icon" "Example Application" "Description"
"HOW TO USE THE APPLICATION
This application requires you to sign up for a key from Microsoft or Yandex Translate. Yandex Translate supports more languages, has a much easier signup process, and requires NO CREDIT CARD. Microsoft Translate gives better results, but requires a credit card to sign up. (But don't worry, nothing will be charged.)
1. In "Global Settings" tab, enable "Use Yandex instead of Microsoft" if you want to use Yandex, else disable to use Microsoft. 1. In "Global Settings" tab, tap "Enter Microsoft/Yandex Subscription Key", input the corresponding key (see Instructions from below). 2. Choose the "Translate from Language" and "Translate to Language". 3. In the "Apps to Translate" tab, find the app you want to translate, click the checkbox next to it. If the checkbox is not visible, try rotating your phone sideways into LandScape mode. 4. Close and restart the app you want translated - it should be translated!
WARNING - Some apps might force close. See the Troubleshooting section.
HOW TO GET YANDEX TRANSLATE SUBSCRIPTION KEY
1. Go to Yandex Website - https://tech.yandex.com/keys/get/?service=trnsl 2. If you don't already have an account, click "register" and sign up for a new account. 3. After signing up, agree to the User Agreement and click "Get API Key". 4. You have successfully received your key! It's something like "trnsl.1.1.201701......"
HOW TO GET MICROSOFT AZURE TRANSLATE SUBSCRIPTION KEY
1. Sign up for a Microsoft Azure account at http://azure.com
2. After you have an account, sign into the Azure portal at http://portal.azure.com
3. Add a Microsoft Translator API subscription to your Azure account. Choose a pay-as-you-go subscription. Will require a credit card, but don't worry, nothing will be charged. Select the + New option. Select Intelligence from the list of services. Select Cognitive Services APIs. Select the API Type option. Select Text Translation In the Pricing Tier section, select the Free Tier (F0) Fill out the rest of the form, and press the Create button.
4. Retrieve your authentication key. Go to All Resources and select the Microsoft Translator API you subscribed to. Go to the Keys option and copy your subscription key to access the service. The subscription key is something like "321dcba...."
TROUBLESHOOTING
1. If no app is being translated, check your Microsoft/Yandex Subscription Key is correct. 2. If the translated app Force Closes/gets stuck on loading the first time after you start translating, click on the app in "Apps to translate" tab, and in "Other Settings" fill in "Delay Before Translating" to 2000. 3. If the translated app used to work fine, but now get stuck on starting, click on the app in "Apps to translate" tab, and click on "Click to Clear Translation Cache". 4. If some parts of the app are not being translated, click on the app in "Apps to translate" tab, and enable "Aggressive Mode". 5. If the app still Force Closes, disable translation for this app and contact me on the support thread on XDA - https://forum.xda-developers.com/xposed/modules/xposed-alltrans-completely-translate-t3539878 "
"Translate Anywhere" "Apps to Translate" "Global Settings" "Instructions"
"Translate Settings" "Parts of App to Translate" "Other Settings"
"Master On/Off" "Turn off to completely disable this module" "Module is turned off, no apps will be translated. Turn on to start using auto-translate!" "Module is turned on, selected apps will be translated. Turn off to completely disable this module."
"Use Yandex instead of Microsoft" "Turn on to use Yandex Translation instead of Microsoft" "Currently using Microsoft Azure Translation. Turn on to use Yandex Translation." "Currently using Yandex Translation. Turn off to use Microsoft Azure Translation."
"Microsoft / Yandex Subscription Key" "Microsoft Subscription Key" "Yandex Subscription Key" "Enter the Subscription Key for Microsoft Azure or Yandex Translation API, whichever is enabled above" "Enter Your Microsoft or Yandex Subscription Key"
"Translate From Language" "Language the app is originally in."
"Translate To Language" "Language you want the app to be translate into."
"Translate Normal Text" "Not Translating Text written using Set Text. Turn on to enable." "Translating Text written using Set Text - Safe. Turn off to disable."
"Translate Text Hints (Gray-Coloured Suggestions) in Text Boxes" "Not Translating Text written using Set Hint. Turn on to enable." "Translating Text written using Set Hint - Safe. Turn off to disable."
"Translate Text in Web Pages inside Apps" "Not Translating Text in WebViews. Turn on to enable." "Translating Text inside WebView - Safe, May Not Work Always. Turn off to disable."
"Aggressive Mode" "Not aggressively translating Text in drawText. Use when all above fails. Turn on to enable." "Aggressively translating Text in drawText - Experimental, May Not Work Always. Turn off to disable."
"Use Caching" "Not saving translations offline, resulting in slower translate and higher data - But may work for more apps. Turn on to save translations." "Saving translations offline to speed up translate and use data. Turn off to disable if your app doesn't start."
"Delay Before Replacing with Translated Text" "Set the time in milliseconds to wait before replace with translated text. Default Value is 0. Set to 1000â€“5000 if the translated app is crashing."
"Delay Before Starting to Translate WebViews" "Set the time in milliseconds to wait before starting to translate WebViews. Default Value is 500. Set to 0 to increase translation speed. Set to 3000-5000 if part of web app are not translating."
"Send Anonymous Crash and Usage Data" "Not sending anonymous crash and Usage data. Sending anonymous crash data helps the developer make the app better." "Sending anonymous crash and usage data. No personal information is transmitted. Anonymous crash data helps the developer make the app better"
"Advanced : Turn on Debug Mode." "Debug mode is off. Not writing debug data to logcat. Turn this on before sending error reports" "Debug mode is on. Writing logs to logcat. This decreases performance - turn off if not needed."
"Translate This App" "Turn off to stop translating this app" "This app will not translated. Turn on to start using auto-translate!" "This will be translated. Turn off to completely disable translating this app."
"OverRide Global Settings" "Using Global Settings for this app. Turn on to change settings only for this app." "Using Local Settings for this app. Turn off to use Global Settings."
"Click to clear Translation Cache" "Click the above to clear the app's translate cache. Use this after changing to/from languages, or if the app does not start."
